title: Wanted: N43 Allen & Ginter, N174 Goodwin, N332 SF Hess, N344 Bravo.
author: epike3

posts.post_title: Wanted: N43 Allen & Ginter, N174 Goodwin, N332 SF Hess, N344 Bravo.
posts.post_content:
Wanted: N43 Allen & Ginter, N174 Goodwin, N332 SF Hess, N344 Bravo. Thanks for looking!

N43 Allen & Ginter: Daly, Ross

N174 Goodwin's Celebrities and Prizefighters: Atkinson, Cus Cuerrero, Pat Fitzgerald

N332 SF Hess (any condition, these are the track and field I am aware of): WM Cummins, George Cartwright, Capt. Daly (all around athlete/hammer throw, Frank Hart, Malcolm Ford, Pat Fitzgerald, W.G. George, John McPherson, Lon Myers, Dan O'Leary, Duncan Ross (all around athlete/hammer throw).

N344 Bravo/Between the Acts (any condition) : Brown, Ennis, Guyon, Hazael, Hart, Merritt, O'Leary, Panghott, Ed. P. Weston

did you see the fantastic cigar box on the bay featuring the Astor cup with the four pedestrians race and stands and balloons and so much more??!!?! I have an example and slept the one offered this week. Kicking self...........

Hi Henry-

Always good to hear from you! I didn't see it, would be fun to take a look if you have a link or want to post a pix.

Best,
Ed
